item.title: LeetCode/387 First Unique Character in a String
item.description: https://leetcode.com/problems/first-unique-character-in-a-string Basically this question is asking you about how to you Dictionary. Understanding how to handle key and value and index, can solve this problem easily. My Solution class Solution(object): def firstUniqChar(self, s): strDict = {} for item in s: if (item in strDict): strDict[item] += 1 else: strDict[item] = 1 for idx, key in enumerate(s): if strDict[key] == 1: return idx return -1
